resource.description: A disk image containing Ubuntu 18.04 for x86. This image will run an `m5 readfile` instruction after booting. If no script file is specified an `m5 exit` instruction will be executed.
resource.name: x86 ubuntu 18.04 img
author: Ayaz Akram

workloads.description: A full boot of Ubuntu 18.04 with Linux 5.4.49 for X86. It runs an `m5 exit` command when the boot is completed unless the readfile is specified. If specified the readfile will be executed after booting.
workloads.name: x86 ubuntu 18.04 boot
